title: my account got stolen , i need help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
i was sleeping this morning, when i woke up and log in to my account, i fund out my account is suspended , there are full of text log about how "My account" abusing the team. and make me banned. 
i did send them a ticket hope they can recover my aco%%%%, but i want to know, how long will it take??

replies.body:
Hey there,

As argonian said below, riot shouldn't take too long to respond to your ticket. However rest assured they will respond and the account will be locked as soon as player support gets a hold of the ticket.

Avoid creating multiple tickets about the issue, even if it takes them 48+ hours to respond as this will push you to the back of the ticket queue.
Riot usually doesn't take that long to reply to tickets so i'd say wait a few hours, If you haven't got any reply after 24 hours of your ticket being submitted then resend one.
